com.philips.lighting.model.sensor

Class PHSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.lighting.model.PHBridgeResource
      • com.philips.lighting.model.sensor.PHSensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PHDaylightSensor, PHGenericFlagSensor, PHGenericStatusSensor, PHGeofenceSensor, PHHumiditySensor, PHOpenCloseSensor, PHPresenceSensor, PHSwitch, PHTemperatureSensor

    public abstract class PHSensor
extends PHBridgeResource
    This class extends from PHBridgeResource and is abstract This represents the base class for all Sensor implementations
